name: Billy Bomber
description:
Think, build, explode TNTs and complete stages - become a Bomber!
Get Billy Bomber and use your imagination and creativity to complete levels in this riddle game! How to do that? Fat Billy isn't going to do it himself - he needs help! The goal is to reach the exit by using dynamites and springs. You can place them wherever you want on the map, and then just watch as your TNT explodes and blows up the lazy Billy, sending him into the space! The game contains 25 different levels and every can be passed in a lot of various ways. Do you want to use TNTs only, or build a complex solution with springs? Just be creative and help Billy Bomber, the TNT-man, with his trouble!
Game Features:
⏩25 levels (+1 hidden!) full of explosions!
⏩Original, simple 2D graphic (a bit old-school)
⏩Easy building drag & drop system that allows you to put items on the map
⏩2 items - TNT and spring 💣
⏩2 game modes - easy and hardcore
⏩Skins - choose your favourite outfit for Billy! 👕👙⛑
⏩Level Editor and Community Levels (Premium only)
⏩Billy Bomber contains puzzle/riddle and arcade elements in one game! 🎮
⏩Amazing soundtrack 🎵
⏩9 languages - English, Polish, Spanish, Hungarian, Brazillian Portugese, Russian, Italian, French, German (more coming soon) 🇬🇧 🇵🇱, 🇪🇸, 🇭🇺, 🇧🇷, 🇷🇺, 🇮🇹, 🇫🇷, 🇩🇪
+ Frequent updates with new explosive functions!
Don't upset Billy, help him now.
Have fun!
